critical_rules.rule: Always use 'unit' not 'course' when referring to competency units
Include RTO number: 'Edmund Barton College (RTO 90768)' on first mention
examples_correct: Edmund Barton College (RTO 90768) offers nationally recognised qualifications
examples_incorrect: Edmund Barton College offers nationally recognised qualifications

critical_rules.rule: Use correct AQF levels: 'Certificate III' not 'Level 3', 'Diploma' not 'Level 5'

examples_correct: Students are assessed as competent or not yet competent
examples_incorrect: Students pass or fail the assessment

critical_rules.rule: NO employment guarantees - FORBIDDEN: 'guaranteed job', 'guaranteed employment', 'you will be hired'
examples_correct: This qualification supports career progression in business
examples_incorrect: Complete this course and get a guaranteed job

critical_rules.rule: NO salary promises - FORBIDDEN: 'you will earn $X', 'average salary of...', 'salary increase guaranteed'
examples_correct: Graduates often pursue roles in management with competitive salaries
examples_incorrect: Complete this qualification and earn $80,000 per year

critical_rules.rule: NO completion time guarantees - FORBIDDEN: 'complete in exactly X months', 'guaranteed completion in X weeks'
examples_correct: Typical duration: 26 weeks full-time or equivalent part-time

critical_rules.rule: NO misleading comparisons - FORBIDDEN: 'better than university', 'superior to...', 'more effective than degree'
examples_correct: VET qualifications provide practical, industry-focused training
examples_incorrect: This diploma is better than a university degree

required_statements.statement: Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL) and Credit Transfer may be available
Completion timeframes vary based on individual circumstances, prior learning, and study load
This qualification is nationally recognised throughout Australia and is valid for life
Support services are available including [career guidance, study support, etc]

quality_standards.standard: Content must reflect current industry practice and workplace relevance
Content must be inclusive and respectful of diverse learners
Content must avoid stereotypes and biased language
Content must be factually accurate and evidence-based
